translation.en: ♪ Dear friend across the river ♪
translation.zh: ‎小河那头的朋友

translation.en: ♪ My hands are cold and bare ♪
translation.zh: ‎我冰冷的手一无所有

translation.en: ♪ Dear friend across the river ♪
translation.zh: ‎小河那头的朋友

translation.en: ♪ I'll take what you can spare ♪
translation.zh: ‎求你随便赏些善意

translation.en: -♪ I ask of you a penny ♪ -[explosion]
translation.zh: ‎哪怕只有一分钱

translation.en: -♪ My fortune it will be ♪ -[grunts]
translation.zh: ‎也是我的财富

translation.en: ♪ I ask you without envy ♪
translation.zh: ‎放心 我并不妒忌

translation.en: ♪ We raise no mighty towers ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们建不出冲天高楼

translation.en: ♪ Our homes are built of stone ♪
translation.zh: ‎只能蜗居在石板巷里

translation.en: ♪ So come across the river ♪
translation.zh: ‎何不过河来一趟？

translation.en: ♪ And find… ♪
translation.zh: ‎来看看

translation.en: We're almost there.
translation.zh: ‎就快到了

translation.en: Aw, man. [grunts]
translation.zh: ‎要命

translation.en: Hey, Powder. -Come take a look. -[grunts]
translation.zh: ‎爆爆 快来看

translation.en: Whoa. It's nice getting above it all, huh?
translation.zh:
‎-天啊
‎-超脱的感觉真好啊 是吧？

translation.en: One day, I'm gonna ride in one of those things.
translation.zh: ‎总有一天 我一定能坐上那个

translation.en: And one day, I'm gonna shoot one of 'em down.
translation.zh: ‎总有一天 我一定一枪射下那个

translation.en: Vi, are, are you sure about this?
translation.zh: ‎蔚 你真要这么干吗？

translation.en: -[Claggor] Look, if we get caught, we're-- -[Vi] We're not gonna get caught.
translation.zh:
‎-听着 要是被人逮住…
‎-没人逮得住我们

translation.en: We'll be in and out before anyone notices.
translation.zh: ‎不会有人发现咱们来过这里

translation.en: [Vi] All right, everybody, follow me. Just don't look down.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 所有人 跟着我 别往下看就行

translation.en: Couldn't we have at least just walked there?
translation.zh: ‎咱们就不能直接走过去吗？

translation.en: Gotta stay out of sight for this one.
translation.zh: ‎带了这孩子 咱们就得避人耳目

translation.en: [Mylo] Called it. -This is on you, Vi. -[Vi groans]
translation.zh: ‎我就知道 你来搞定 蔚

translation.en: -I'll get her. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-我去接她
‎-别

translation.en: Powder, look at me.
translation.zh: ‎爆爆 看着我

translation.en: [Vi] What did I tell you? That… [exhales] …I'm ready.
translation.zh:
‎-我跟你说过什么？
‎-你说我已经行了

translation.en: [Vi] That's right! So?
translation.zh: ‎没错 所以呢？

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢

translation.en: What if Vander finds out we're all the way up here?
translation.zh:
‎要是范德尔
‎发现咱们来上城了怎么办？

translation.en: [Vi] Look around you. You think anyone topside's going hungry?
translation.zh:
‎看看周围
‎哪家不是吃饱喝足 富得流油？

translation.en: Besides, this is exactly the sort of job Vander would've pulled
translation.zh: ‎再说了 范德尔在我们这年纪 ‎就爱干这种事

translation.en: when he was our age.
translation.zh: ‎就爱干这种事

translation.en: I'm going. Are you with me or not?
translation.zh: ‎反正我要去 你们到底跟不跟我走？

translation.en: [sighs] Vander's gonna kill us. Yeah, only if we screw up.
translation.zh:
‎-范德尔会宰了咱们的
‎-咱们搞砸了才会

translation.en: So don't screw up.
translation.zh: ‎别搞砸就行了

translation.en: -All clear. -[Mylo breathes deeply]
translation.zh: ‎这里没人

translation.en: [groans] Who locks their balcony?
translation.zh: ‎谁会锁阳台啊？

translation.en: [Claggor] There's tons of enforcers down there.
translation.zh: ‎下面到处都是执法官

translation.en: Means we're in the right place.
translation.zh: ‎说明来对地方了

translation.en: You gonna get that door open any time soon? Working on it.
translation.zh:
‎-这门是不是马上就能开了？
‎-撬着呢

translation.en: Seeing as I'm the only one who knows how to pick locks,
translation.zh: ‎既然会撬锁的只有小爷我 我劝你…

translation.en: Animals.
translation.zh: ‎禽兽

translation.en: You know, Claggor, for once you're right.
translation.zh: ‎我说 克莱格 这回你说对了

translation.en: We are definitely not supposed to be here.
translation.zh: ‎这可真不是咱们该来的地方

translation.en: Must be an inventor.
translation.zh: ‎这家是搞发明的

translation.en: Whoa, I think this is a real Valdiani.
translation.zh: ‎这应该是货真价实的瓦尔蒂亚尼制造

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What about this?
translation.zh: ‎是吗？那这个怎么样？

translation.en: That's a nose hair trimmer.
translation.zh: ‎那就是个鼻毛修剪器

translation.en: Keep an eye out for anything that looks valuable, Powder.
translation.zh: ‎留意找找看上去值钱的玩意儿 爆爆

translation.en: Before Mylo fills the bag with junk.
translation.zh: ‎别让麦罗装一堆破烂回去

translation.en: Uh… guys?
translation.zh: ‎各位？

translation.en: Wait, Vi, how the hell did we find this place?
translation.zh: ‎等等 蔚 你到底怎么知道这地方的？

translation.en: -[grunts] -It was a tip from Little Man.
translation.zh: ‎小不点给我的线报

translation.en: -Little Man? -Just leave it. [Vi] Come on.
translation.zh:
‎-小不点吗？
‎-别管它了 快点

translation.en: [Claggor] How can anyone have so much stuff?
translation.zh: ‎一个人怎么能拥有这么多东西？

translation.en: [Mylo] Simple, just get born lucky.
translation.zh: ‎还能怎么？天生命好呗

translation.en: [gasps] Woo-hoo!
translation.zh: ‎太棒了

translation.en: -[whispers] Mylo. -[Mylo grunts]
translation.zh: ‎麦罗

translation.en: [whispers] Powder, we gotta go.
translation.zh: ‎爆爆 咱们得走了

translation.en: -[gasps] -[man muffled] Hello? Is someone in there?
translation.zh: ‎有人吗？谁在里面吗？

translation.en: -[Mylo] Come on. -[Vi and Powder grunt]
translation.zh: ‎快点

translation.en: [whispers] We'll be fine. Just get back on the roof.
translation.zh: ‎咱们会没事的 回屋顶就安全了

translation.en: [Vi grunts] Hold on!
translation.zh: ‎稳住

translation.en: [man] Whoa! Look out!
translation.zh: ‎小心

translation.en: Watch out! [man grunts]
translation.zh: ‎小心

translation.en: -Shit. -[train honks]
translation.zh: ‎见鬼

translation.en: Stop right there! [enforcer 1 grunts]
translation.zh: ‎给我站住

translation.en: -[crowd clamor] -[enforcer 1] Get them off!
translation.zh: ‎拦下他们

translation.en: -[Vi] Faster! -[Powder screams]
translation.zh: ‎再跑快点

translation.en: -[woman] Look out! -[metallic clank]
translation.zh: ‎当心

translation.en: [enforcer 1 grunts] Down there! You can't get away!
translation.zh:
‎-在下面
‎-别让他们跑了

translation.en: -[enforcer 1] Hey! -[enforcer 2] Come on!
translation.zh:
‎-快点
‎-追

translation.en: -[Vi] This way! -[all panting]
translation.zh: ‎这边

translation.en: [enforcer 1] Keep going!
translation.zh: ‎继续追

translation.en: -[all grunt] -[Mylo] Go, go, go!
translation.zh: ‎快

translation.en: Oh, man, not again. I just got this shirt-- [yells]
translation.zh: ‎别又走这里啊 我这身衣服可是新的

translation.en: Thought last time was the last time we were gonna do this.
translation.zh: ‎上次之后我以为就没下次了呢

translation.en: [Vi] Well, this time's the last time.
translation.zh: ‎这次之后就真没下次了

translation.en: Guys, what was that? What the hell happened back there?
translation.zh: ‎你们说刚才 刚才那到底怎么回事？

translation.en: I don't know. I didn't do anything.
translation.zh: ‎我又不知道 我什么也没干

translation.en: You could fill a damn library with all the things you didn't do.
translation.zh:
‎你没干的事要是记录在案
‎都能装满一个图书馆了

translation.en: Guys, we just emptied a Piltover penthouse right under the enforcers' noses.
translation.zh:
‎各位 咱们刚搬空了
‎皮尔特沃夫的一座豪宅 ‎就在执法官眼皮底下

translation.en: So, if you're done beating yourselves up, let's get this home.
translation.zh:
‎所以要是你们互相骂够了
‎咱们赶紧启程回家吧

translation.en: -Nice haul? -You could say that.
translation.zh:
‎-挺有收获吧？
‎-确实还不错

translation.en: [Deckard] I heard there was some action across the river.
translation.zh: ‎我听说河那头出了点事

translation.en: Someone, uh, someone really kicked the nest, huh?
translation.zh: ‎有些人不小心捅了马蜂窝是吧？

translation.en: Is that so?
translation.zh: ‎有这种事吗？

translation.en: But now you're, you're tracking this mess of yours through my streets.
translation.zh:
‎结果现在
‎你们又到我的街区来找麻烦了

translation.en: -Your streets? What makes you think-- -Listen, we don't want any trouble, okay?
translation.zh: ‎你的街区？你凭什么以为… ‎我们没想找麻烦好吗？

translation.en: Hear that, Deckard? They don't want any trouble.
translation.zh: ‎听见了吗 德卡？人家没想找麻烦

translation.en: You know, in my experience, trouble finds you.
translation.zh: ‎可惜按我的经验 麻烦自会找上门

translation.en: There's no reason this has to get ugly.
translation.zh: ‎咱们也没必要闹得太难看

translation.en: [Deckard] How about you share a little taste of your treasure there
translation.zh: ‎不如你们就分点甜头给我们尝尝？

translation.en: -and we'll call it even? -No, no, no. We worked too hard to…
translation.zh: ‎咱们就扯平了 ‎不可能 我们费了那么大劲才…

translation.en: Just a taste?
translation.zh:
‎-就尝尝是吗？
‎-就尝…

translation.en: This day's turning out all right after all. Wait!
translation.zh:
‎-这一天总算过得像点样了
‎-等等

translation.en: Wanna see how that ends?
translation.zh: ‎我说你还想干什么？

translation.en: Where's Powder?
translation.zh: ‎爆爆呢？

translation.en: Oh! Oh! You little… [grunts]
translation.zh: ‎小妞

translation.en: Come on, Mouser, I need you!
translation.zh: ‎快啊小耗子 我需要你

translation.en: -[Powder] No. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎不

translation.en: -[both grunt] -[sloshes]
translation.zh: ‎不

translation.en: -You did what? -I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-你干了什么？
‎-对不起嘛

translation.en: I tried to fight him off with Mouser, but… she didn't work.
translation.zh: ‎我想用小耗子把他打跑的 ‎可是它失灵了

translation.en: -Who saw that coming? -We never should have gone over there.
translation.zh:
‎-这事谁料到了？
‎-咱们就不该到那边去

translation.en: Doesn't matter. The stuff's gone.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 反正已经丢了

translation.en: It's all right, Powder. At least you're okay.
translation.zh: ‎不要紧 爆爆 至少你没事

translation.en: [Mylo] Okay? What about us?
translation.zh: ‎她没事？那我们呢？

translation.en: I get my face bashed in, and she just gets a pass?
translation.zh:
‎爷这张帅脸都破相了
‎她倒不用受罚吗？

translation.en: [Vi] Yup.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: Every time. Every time she comes, something goes wrong.
translation.zh:
‎每次都这样
‎每次有她跟着 准会出岔子

translation.en: She jinxes every job. [Vi] Just drop it, Mylo.
translation.zh:
‎-有她在干什么都倒霉
‎-别说了 麦罗

translation.en: -[grunts] -[man] Sit still!
translation.zh: ‎好好待着

translation.en: -[woman] Come on, get out of here! -[gasps, groans]
translation.zh: ‎拜托 滚出去

translation.en: -[woman] You gotta pay! -Look at that!
translation.zh:
‎-没钱就别来
‎-你怎么看？

translation.en: ♪ What brings you to the lost and found to me? ♪
translation.zh: ‎（福根酒馆）

translation.en: -Hey! Watch it. -Hey!
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 女士们
‎-看着点

translation.en: Well, I, uh, suppose that concludes our business, then.
translation.zh:
‎好了 我想
‎咱们的生意可以告一段落了

translation.en: Mm. I suppose it does. [snickers]
translation.zh: ‎我想也是

translation.en: Wait… [man chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎等等

translation.en: Uh, wait a minute.
translation.zh: ‎等一下

translation.en: This, uh… [chuckles] uh, this… isn't what we agreed on, so…
translation.zh: ‎这钱跟咱们说好的不一样 所以…

translation.en: Well, demand for your wares has dropped since we made our arrangements.
translation.zh: ‎你这里的货现在用不着那么多了 ‎因为我们已经做了安排

translation.en: This is the new value.
translation.zh: ‎这是新价钱

translation.en: Uh, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. We, um… we shook on it. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎等一下 咱们不都定了嘛？

translation.en: Ten thousand.
translation.zh:
‎-是一万啊
‎-做买卖总要担这种风险的

translation.en: -Such are the risks of business. -Ten.
translation.zh:
‎-是一万啊
‎-做买卖总要担这种风险的 ‎-是一万
‎-这价钱已经很公道了

translation.en: It's a fair price.
translation.zh:
‎-是一万
‎-这价钱已经很公道了

translation.en: I think you should take it. No, no, no, no. No, no, no, no, no. [scoffs]
translation.zh:
‎-你还是见好就收吧
‎-不行

translation.en: I can't do that. I can't do that!
translation.zh: ‎我不能接受 不能接受

translation.en: Make your choice.
translation.zh: ‎你自己选

translation.en: [man] You folks need anything? Leave us.
translation.zh:
‎-两位有什么需要？
‎-走开

translation.en: You sure about that?
translation.zh: ‎您确定吗？

translation.en: -Sounded to me like-- -Piss off.
translation.zh:
‎-我倒是觉得…
‎-滚蛋

translation.en: I think I know what you need.
translation.zh: ‎我想我知道您们需要什么了

translation.en: -You don't seem to listen, barman-- -A bit of advice.
translation.zh:
‎你好像听不懂人话啊 臭调酒的 ‎奉劝您一句
‎别在酒馆里吓唬给您倒酒的人

translation.en: Don't threaten the guy who pours the drinks.
translation.zh:
‎奉劝您一句
‎别在酒馆里吓唬给您倒酒的人

translation.en: So you're Vander.
translation.zh: ‎原来你就是范德尔

translation.en: [woman] Hound of the Underground.
translation.zh: ‎底城的猎犬

translation.en: I expected something… younger.
translation.zh: ‎我还以为会是个年轻人

translation.en: We were expecting traders who would honor their word,
translation.zh: ‎我们也以为生意人都会讲诚信

translation.en: so I guess we're all disappointed.
translation.zh: ‎结果我看咱们两边都失望了

translation.en: You got us all wrong, my friend.
translation.zh: ‎你这误会可大了 哥们

translation.en: We were just… negotiating.
translation.zh: ‎我们刚才就是讨价还价而已

translation.en: Now you're speaking my language.
translation.zh: ‎这话还有点跟我沟通的诚意

translation.en: How about you just give Huck the rest of what you owe him,
translation.zh:
‎不如这样吧
‎你们欠哈克多少钱都痛快给他

translation.en: and I'll let you walk out of here in one piece?
translation.zh: ‎我就让你们完完整整地走出这里

translation.en: Do we, uh… have a deal?
translation.zh: ‎咱们成交吗？

translation.en: [coughs] This is vile.
translation.zh: ‎这烟也太冲了

translation.en: You'll learn to love it.
translation.zh: ‎你会爱上这口的

translation.en: Welcome to the Lanes.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到黑巷

translation.en: Vander learns none of this.
translation.zh:
‎-这事绝不能让范德尔知道
‎-把心放肚子里

translation.en: [Mylo] No worries there. Powder took care of the evidence.
translation.zh:
‎-这事绝不能让范德尔知道
‎-把心放肚子里 ‎-爆爆都把证据销毁了
‎-我尽力了 好吗？

translation.en: I tried, okay? You don't get it. You're older, you're bigger.
translation.zh:
‎-爆爆都把证据销毁了
‎-我尽力了 好吗？ ‎你们根本不懂 你们都比我大 比我壮

translation.en: -It, it isn't fair. -So stick with us! Take a punch or two.
translation.zh:
‎-这不公平
‎-那你倒是跟紧点 好歹挨上两拳

translation.en: -[Vander] Everyone all right? -[Mylo] Never better.
translation.zh:
‎-大家都还好吧？
‎-就没这么好过

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: I don't suppose you can explain why it is that I'm hearing about an explosion
translation.zh: ‎我想你们应该解释不清楚吧 ‎我怎么听说上城发生了爆炸

translation.en: and a foot chase topside?
translation.zh: ‎执法官都发动追捕了？

translation.en: Four children fleeing the scene.
translation.zh: ‎四个孩子逃离了现场

translation.en: What the hell were you thinking?
translation.zh: ‎你们脑子坏了是不是？

translation.en: That we can handle a real job. A real job?
translation.zh:
‎-我以为我们可以好好干一票大的
‎-干一票大的？

translation.en: We got our own tip, planned a route, nobody even saw.
translation.zh: ‎我们得了线报 计划得很好 没人发现

translation.en: -You blew up a building. -That wasn't…
translation.zh:
‎-你们轰塌了一栋楼
‎-那不是…

translation.en: Did you even stop to think about what could have happened to you?
translation.zh: ‎你动脑子想过 你会出什么事吗？

translation.en: Eh? To them?
translation.zh: ‎想过他们吗？

translation.en: Where did you even get this tip?
translation.zh: ‎那个线报又是从哪里来的？

translation.en: -We just heard it at Benzo's shop. -From?
translation.zh:
‎-就是在本索店里听人说的
‎-谁说的？

translation.en: -Little Man. -[sighs heavily]
translation.zh: ‎小不点

translation.en: I took us there. If you wanna be mad, be mad at me.
translation.zh: ‎是我带他们去的 ‎你要是想发火 冲我来就好了

translation.en: But you're the one who always says we have to earn our place in this world.
translation.zh:
‎亏你还老念叨着
‎咱们得在这里打出自己的地盘

translation.en: I also told you time and time again, the Northside's off-limits.
translation.zh: ‎我也跟你们念叨过好几回 ‎不许踏进上城那地界半步

translation.en: -We stay out of Piltover's business. -Why?
translation.zh:
‎-皮尔特沃夫的营生咱不能碰
‎-凭什么？

translation.en: They've got plenty, while we're down here scraping together coins.
translation.zh:
‎他们油水那么足
‎咱们这里就仨瓜俩枣 ‎还不够塞牙缝的

translation.en: When did you get so comfortable living in someone else's shadow?
translation.zh:
‎你什么时候活得跟裤衩似的
‎人家放什么屁都兜着？

translation.en: Everyone out.
translation.zh: ‎其他人出去

translation.en: Sit down.
translation.zh:
‎-坐下
‎-我站着吧

translation.en: -I'm fine. -[Vander] Sit. Down.
translation.zh:
‎-坐下
‎-我站着吧 ‎坐下

translation.en: Those kids look up to you.
translation.zh: ‎那帮小子都当你是老大

translation.en: Yeah, I know. [sighs] You know, but you don't know.
translation.zh:
‎-是 我知道
‎-你知道 你知道个六

translation.en: When people look up to you, you don't get to be selfish.
translation.zh:
‎有人拿你当老大
‎你就不能只考虑自己

translation.en: -I'm not-- -You say run, they run.
translation.zh:
‎-我没有
‎-你说跑 他们就跑

translation.en: You say swim, they dive in.
translation.zh: ‎你让游泳 他们就往水里扎

translation.en: You say light a fire, they show up with oil.
translation.zh: ‎你要放火 他们就给你浇油

translation.en: But whatever happens, it's on you.
translation.zh: ‎但不管出什么事 责任在你

translation.en: Just like it's on me what happens to us down here.
translation.zh:
‎就像底城不管出了什么事
‎责任都在我一样

translation.en: We make ourselves a problem for Piltover, and they will send the enforcers.
translation.zh: ‎咱们只要惹了皮尔特沃夫 ‎人家就会派执法官来收拾咱们

translation.en: So? Why answer to them?
translation.zh: ‎那又怎样？你理他们干吗？

translation.en: These are our streets. Someone should remind them of that.
translation.zh:
‎这地界是咱们的
‎就该有人让他们长长记性

translation.en: You're not hearing me. That path?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么就听不明白？你用那种方式

translation.en: This? It's not gonna solve your problems.
translation.zh: ‎用这个 根本解决不了你的问题

translation.en: Just makes more of them.
translation.zh: ‎只会把篓子越捅越多

translation.en: We clear?
translation.zh: ‎懂了吗？

translation.en: -How'd you get this? -[scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎这伤是怎么弄的？

translation.en: Some idiot was following us.
translation.zh: ‎有个傻帽一直缠着我们

translation.en: On our side? Who?
translation.zh: ‎在咱这边吗？谁？

translation.en: I don't know. He was after the stuff. Where is it now?
translation.zh:
‎-不认识 他要的是东西
‎-那东西呢？

translation.en: [sighs] We lost it.
translation.zh: ‎我们没保住

translation.en: All of it? Good.
translation.zh: ‎都没保住吗？正好

translation.en: Nothing can tie you to what happened up there.
translation.zh:
‎没什么能证明
‎你们跟那边的事有关系了

translation.en: You're gonna have to lay low for a bit, understand?
translation.zh: ‎以后你们得安分点了 知不知道？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎行吧

translation.en: We're gonna be fine, right? I'll take care of it.
translation.zh:
‎-我们不会有事 对吧？
‎-我会摆平的

translation.en: Oh, you did put that idiot on his ass, though, right?
translation.zh:
‎对了 你肯定也没给
‎那傻帽好果子吃 是吧？

translation.en: Get up, Claggor. We're going out.
translation.zh: ‎起来 克莱格 咱们出去一趟

translation.en: Wait, now? [huffs]
translation.zh: ‎等等 现在吗？

translation.en: Hey, hey, that's mine! -You wanna be treated like adults, right? -[Claggor grunts]
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 这是我的
‎-你不是不想被人当小孩看吗？

translation.en: Then you should know better than to come back from a job empty-handed.
translation.zh: ‎大人白干一场空手而归就是这待遇

translation.en: [Vander] I'm gonna have a little word with your informant.
translation.zh: ‎我去找你们那位线人聊两句

translation.en: All right, give me the details of exactly what happened up there.
translation.zh:
‎来吧 给我一五一十地交代
‎上城到底发生了什么

translation.en: [Mylo] She's a problem. [Vi sighs] Mylo, I'm really not…
translation.zh:
‎-她就是个累赘
‎-麦罗 我真的不想…

translation.en: [Mylo] Do you remember what was in that bag?
translation.zh: ‎你记得那包里都装了什么吗？

translation.en: The biggest payout we've ever seen and she just lost it.
translation.zh:
‎咱这辈子就没见过那么多宝贝
‎结果她全给丢了

translation.en: She made a mistake. Name one time she hasn't.
translation.zh:
‎-她只是犯了个错
‎-她有不犯错的时候吗？

translation.en: -[Vi] She's young. -[Mylo] Don't bullshit me.
translation.zh:
‎-她还小呢
‎-你就别扯了

translation.en: You were twice the person at half her age.
translation.zh: ‎你有她一半年纪就一个能顶俩

translation.en: You know what, Mylo? You're right.
translation.zh: ‎知道吗 麦罗？你说得对

translation.en: There's a bunch of things Powder just can't do.
translation.zh: ‎爆爆确实有一大堆事情做不到

translation.en: -[Mylo] You don't have to tell me twice. -[bangs]
translation.zh: ‎这个我早看出来了

translation.en: -Like, complain about everything. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-比如没完没了地发牢骚
‎-什么？

translation.en: -And brag nonstop. -Okay, okay, I see where this is going.
translation.zh:
‎-还有不停吹牛皮
‎-行了 我知道你要说什么了

translation.en: [Vi] Pick fights with the group when we need to focus.
translation.zh: ‎你还在应该赶路的时候跟帮派杠上

translation.en: [chuckling] Vi, I…
translation.zh: ‎蔚 我…

translation.en: And tell strangers on the street that we got a nice haul?
translation.zh:
‎还敢跟大街上不认识的人
‎承认咱们挺有收获？

translation.en: -I, I didn't mean to-- -Powder's my problem, okay?
translation.zh:
‎-我说着玩的
‎-爆爆的毛病归我管

translation.en: Your problem is never knowing when to shut up.
translation.zh: ‎你的毛病是嘴上从来没个把门的

translation.en: But I'm gonna help you with that. Ready?
translation.zh: ‎不过我也能帮你改改 好吧？

translation.en: You see this look on my face?
translation.zh: ‎看见我这表情了吗？

translation.en: This will always mean it's time to shut up.
translation.zh: ‎以后我一有这表情你就给我闭嘴

translation.en: But… I…
translation.zh: ‎可是我…

translation.en: Nobody comes in.
translation.zh: ‎别让人进来

translation.en: We're closed.
translation.zh: ‎本店打烊了

translation.en: Well, open up.
translation.zh:
‎-再开就是了
‎-停业了

translation.en: For good. You can take your worthless junk elsewhere.
translation.zh:
‎-再开就是了
‎-停业了 ‎带着你那堆破烂去找别人吧

translation.en: [groans] Just as well.
translation.zh: ‎那我还真找对了

translation.en: Owner's the shittiest businessman I know.
translation.zh: ‎这堆破烂跟你做生意的水平最般配

translation.en: -Ekko. What's going on with that thing? -[grunts]
translation.zh: ‎艾克 那玩意儿怎么了？

translation.en: Give me a few seconds. The cannon pinion's still busted.
translation.zh: ‎再给我几秒钟 这炮的齿轮还没拧好

translation.en: Finish it later. Vander and I need a word.
translation.zh: ‎一会儿再弄 我跟范德尔说两句话

translation.en: -But-- -[Benzo] Uh-uh. Off you go.
translation.zh:
‎-可是…
‎-行了 快出去

translation.en: -[Ekko] Claggor. -[Claggor] He-he-hey, Little Man.
translation.zh:
‎-克莱格
‎-嘿 小不点

translation.en: You're a little early.
translation.zh: ‎你来得早了点

translation.en: My guys are still roundin' up this month's collections.
translation.zh: ‎我的人还没凑够这个月的数量

translation.en: Won't have numbers until next, um…
translation.zh: ‎我还不知道有多少

translation.en: Why are you muckin' about with this?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么蹚进了这摊浑水？

translation.en: I assume you've heard. Yeah, me and half the undercity.
translation.zh:
‎-看来你也听说了
‎-当然 半个底城都听说了

translation.en: [sighs] How could they be so stupid?
translation.zh: ‎这帮臭小子怎么能蠢成这样？

translation.en: The younger folk think it's the right thing to do.
translation.zh: ‎年轻人都把这种事当作正道

translation.en: [Vander] Yeah, and Vi's one of them.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 蔚也是这么想

translation.en: Throws herself at trouble wherever she can find some.
translation.zh:
‎这孩子真是
‎哪里能给自己惹祸就往哪里钻

translation.en: Eh, they're growing up, Vander.
translation.zh:
‎孩子总要长大的 范德尔
‎各人有各人的路要走

translation.en: Looking to write their own stories. You can't protect them forever.
translation.zh:
‎孩子总要长大的 范德尔
‎各人有各人的路要走 ‎你不可能永远护着他们

translation.en: Someone was following them.
translation.zh:
‎-当时有人跟着他们
‎-我听说的可是一大帮子人

translation.en: -Whole lot of someones, from what I heard. -Not enforcers.
translation.zh:
‎-当时有人跟着他们
‎-我听说的可是一大帮子人 ‎我说的不是执法官 是咱们这边的人

translation.en: -Someone on our side. -Who?
translation.zh: ‎我说的不是执法官 是咱们这边的人 ‎谁？

translation.en: There's worse things than enforcers out there.
translation.zh: ‎咱们这边有比执法官更可怕的人

translation.en: We both know that.
translation.zh: ‎你我都认识

translation.en: Yeah, I was hopin' you'd be working today.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我就估计你今天会在店里

translation.en: -Did you guys go? -Sure did.
translation.zh:
‎-你们去了吗？
‎-当然去了

translation.en: Hey, listen, how did you find that place?
translation.zh: ‎我问你 你是怎么知道那地方的？

translation.en: -I just-- -Whoa, did you fight the enforcers?
translation.zh:
‎-我就是…
‎-你们跟执法官干架了吗？

translation.en: What? Oh, no. Eh, just some bums.
translation.zh: ‎什么？没有 只是几个混混打的

translation.en: Oh, did Vi kick their asses?
translation.zh: ‎蔚痛扁他们了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I wouldn't be here otherwise.
translation.zh: ‎扁了 不然我今天也过不来了

translation.en: Oh, she showed me a couple moves to practice. Look.
translation.zh: ‎她教了我两招 让我自己练 你看

translation.en: -Yeah, it's… it's coming along. -Ya!
translation.zh: ‎挺好 你进步了

translation.en: Hey, so, how'd you find that place, anyway?
translation.zh: ‎话说回来 你怎么知道那地方的？

translation.en: Uh, this weirdo came into the shop.
translation.zh: ‎之前店里来过一个怪人

translation.en: Bought a whole bunch of stuff Benzo only keeps there for display.
translation.zh: ‎买下了一大堆本索纯当摆设用的玩意

translation.en: He paid in gold and didn't even haggle.
translation.zh: ‎他给的是金币 还不还价

translation.en: I charged him double price. Sucker.
translation.zh:
‎我就干脆把价格翻了个倍 ‎-这冤大头
‎-那你怎么知道他住哪里的？

translation.en: -But how did you know where he lived? -Uh, followed him.
translation.zh:
‎-这冤大头
‎-那你怎么知道他住哪里的？ ‎-就跟踪他喽 不然呢？
‎-也是

translation.en: -How else? -Oh. Right.
translation.zh:
‎-就跟踪他喽 不然呢？
‎-也是

translation.en: [Claggor] Oh, crap.
translation.zh: ‎完蛋了

translation.en: -Uh… -They'll be fine. Go.
translation.zh: ‎他们交给我 快走

translation.en: Well, hello.
translation.zh: ‎你们好啊

translation.en: -[Benzo] Evening, friends. -[hissing]
translation.zh: ‎两位晚上好

translation.en: [whispers] Shit.
translation.zh: ‎见鬼

translation.en: Something I can help you with?
translation.zh: ‎到本店有何贵干啊？

translation.en: Some trencher trash attacked one of the buildings in the Academy district,
translation.zh:
‎学院区一栋大楼
‎遭到了几个阴沟货的袭击

translation.en: but you already knew that.
translation.zh: ‎不过你们已经知道了吧？

translation.en: We're looking for the culprits. Got a description?
translation.zh:
‎-我们是来追查犯人的
‎-犯人长什么样子？

translation.en: Yeah, it's exactly who you're picturing in that thick head of yours.
translation.zh:
‎就长你这木脑袋里
‎此刻浮现出来的样子

translation.en: Mm. You think my head is thick? Uh, just past the average.
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得我脑袋木吗？
‎-是比一般人木点儿

translation.en: Listen, you shady son of a…
translation.zh: ‎听好了 你个老混蛋

translation.en: [enforcer] How about you go for a little walk, Marcus?
translation.zh: ‎你还是出去走一走吧 马可斯？

translation.en: Cool off a bit.
translation.zh: ‎稍微冷静一下

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: ‎去

translation.en: [Benzo] Lovely chap you've brought.
translation.zh: ‎你这小伙子挺可爱

translation.en: [enforcer] Don't mind the kid. Doesn't know when to pipe down.
translation.zh: ‎别搭理那小子 他就是管不住那张嘴

translation.en: [Vander] Some things are the same topside and bottom.
translation.zh: ‎看来管不住嘴的人上城和底城都有

translation.en: You know this crossed a line upstairs. Was anyone hurt?
translation.zh:
‎-你也知道这对上城是越界了
‎-有没有人受伤？

translation.en: A building was blown to bits. What do you think?
translation.zh:
‎一整栋楼都炸成碎片了
‎你说有没有？

translation.en: Those who did this will be dealt with.
translation.zh: ‎犯事的人一定会受罚的

translation.en: That workshop belonged to the Kirammans.
translation.zh: ‎被炸毁的那间工作室是吉拉曼恩家的

translation.en: You know what kind of stuff they had in there?
translation.zh: ‎你知道那屋里都放着什么东西吗？

translation.en: Makes this place look like a candy shop.
translation.zh: ‎这家店和那里一比只能算是小儿科

translation.en: The Council needs someone to make an example of.
translation.zh: ‎议会需要抓个人回来杀鸡儆猴

translation.en: People need to feel safe. Yeah, topside people.
translation.zh:
‎-人心惶惶需要安抚
‎-是啊 人上人是得好好伺候

translation.en: [enforcer] We had a deal, Vander.
translation.zh: ‎咱们可说好的 范德尔

translation.en: You keep your people off my streets, and I stay out of your business.
translation.zh: ‎只要别让你的人跑到我的辖区里 ‎我就不管你们干什么勾当

translation.en: Give me a name. We'll do things quiet.
translation.zh: ‎把人交出来 我们会低调处理

translation.en: No one will know you were involved. I can't do that.
translation.zh:
‎-不会有人知道跟你有关
‎-这我办不到

translation.en: You don't seem to grasp how serious this is.
translation.zh: ‎你好像还没明白这起事件的严重性

translation.en: If I don't put someone behind bars tonight,
translation.zh: ‎如果今晚我没能将犯人关进牢里

translation.en: the next time I come down here, I'll have an army of enforcers with me.
translation.zh: ‎下次再到你这里来 ‎我就必须带着一整队执法官了

translation.en: We both know how that'll go.
translation.zh: ‎到时会怎样你我都清楚

translation.en: I'm sorry, Grayson, but I can't offer up my own people.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 格雷森
‎我不能把我的人出卖给你

translation.en: If you change your mind, this will reach me.
translation.zh: ‎你要是改主意了 用这个联系我

translation.en: [Grayson] And only me.
translation.zh: ‎别人不会知道

translation.en: What are you calling this one?
translation.zh: ‎这个又叫什么？

translation.en: [Powder] Whisker.
translation.zh: ‎小胡子

translation.en: -You wanna talk about today? -What's the point?
translation.zh:
‎-要不要跟我聊聊今天的事？
‎-有什么好聊的？

translation.en: I ruined everything. I always do.
translation.zh: ‎是我把一切搞砸的 我总是这样

translation.en: Nobody said that.
translation.zh:
‎-没人这么说
‎-是没这么说

translation.en: No. Just that you were "twice the person" at half my age.
translation.zh:
‎人家说的是
‎你在我一半年纪就一个能顶俩

translation.en: You heard them. I'm not a fighter.
translation.zh: ‎你也听见他们说的了 我不会打架

translation.en: You don't have to be.
translation.zh: ‎你不用会打架

translation.en: Look, I've got these and you've got those.
translation.zh: ‎你看 我有这些 而你有那些

translation.en: They never work.
translation.zh:
‎-都是没用的发明
‎-早晚有用

translation.en: -Come with me. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-跟我来
‎-干吗？

translation.en: [Vi] Come on.
translation.zh: ‎来呀

translation.en: What are we doing here?
translation.zh: ‎咱们来这里干吗？

translation.en: See that gutter running along the canal?
translation.zh: ‎看见河岸那条排水沟了吗？

translation.en: [Vi] That's where Claggor got his foot stuck running from enforcers.
translation.zh:
‎克莱格就是在那里
‎为了躲执法官卡住了脚的

translation.en: They thought it was funny, so they left him there.
translation.zh: ‎那帮人看他好笑 就把他扔在那里了

translation.en: He was out all night before we found him.
translation.zh: ‎找到他的时候他已经晾了一夜

translation.en: That sign?
translation.zh: ‎那牌子？

translation.en: -[Vi] You see it? -[Powder] Uh-huh.
translation.zh:
‎-看见了吗？
‎-看见了

translation.en: Mylo tripped over his own paint bucket
translation.zh: ‎麦罗被自己的油漆桶绊倒了

translation.en: and nearly fell off trying to draw a giant middle finger.
translation.zh:
‎差点摔下去
‎就为了弄个特大号的涂鸦

translation.en: -[Vi] His ass made that splotch. -[Powder laughs]
translation.zh: ‎那团印子是他的屁股蹭出来的

translation.en: And that?
translation.zh: ‎还有那个？

translation.en: When I was a kid, some guy took my favorite toy and threw it up there.
translation.zh:
‎我小时候
‎有个家伙抢走了我最喜欢的玩具 ‎把它丢在那里了

translation.en: I used to come out here at night and stare at it,
translation.zh: ‎我就经常在夜里跑过来看看它

translation.en: hoping maybe the wind or a bird might knock it down.
translation.zh: ‎盼着能有风或者鸟把它给弄下来

translation.en: We've all had bad days.
translation.zh: ‎我们都有过不顺心的时候

translation.en: But we learn. And we stick together.
translation.zh: ‎但总能学着生存 而且非常团结

translation.en: Oh, I forgot.
translation.zh: ‎我刚想起来

translation.en: These were in my pocket.
translation.zh:
‎我把这些装在兜里了
‎是从那间屋子里拿的

translation.en: -They're from the apartment. -What are they?
translation.zh:
‎我把这些装在兜里了
‎是从那间屋子里拿的 ‎这些是什么？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 要给范德尔吗？

translation.en: -Should we show Vander? -No.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 要给范德尔吗？ ‎不

translation.en: Let's keep this our little secret.
translation.zh: ‎这事就当是咱俩的小秘密

translation.en: Mylo's wrong, Powder. You're stronger than you think.
translation.zh: ‎麦罗错了 爆爆 你比你想的要强大

translation.en: And one day…
translation.zh: ‎总有一天

translation.en: this city's gonna respect us.
translation.zh: ‎咱们会赢得这座城市的尊重

translation.en: [man 1] You were supposed to follow them and not interfere.
translation.zh: ‎你当时应该只跟着他们 不该插手

translation.en: [grunting] I'm sorry. [Deckard] They just caught us by surprise.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我们没想到他们那么能打

translation.en: [man 1] Now his accomplice is asking questions about you.
translation.zh: ‎这下他的同伙可有的问了 问你的事

translation.en: That's not a risk I'm willing to take.
translation.zh: ‎我可没打算冒这样的风险

translation.en: The kids. It was their fault, the explosion in the upper city.
translation.zh:
‎那帮小孩 都怪他们
‎高城的爆炸是他们干的

translation.en: [man 1] That was them?
translation.zh:
‎-是他们干的吗？
‎-对

translation.en: [Deckard] Yeah. The topsiders are up in arms looking for 'em.
translation.zh: ‎上城的人都气疯了 正搜捕他们呢

translation.en: [man 1] Vander's in trouble.
translation.zh: ‎范德尔有麻烦了

translation.en: [man 1] Smartest thing you ever said, boy.
translation.zh: ‎还好你把这事说出来了 小子

translation.en: Get him a meal.
translation.zh: ‎给他顿饭吃

translation.en: But keep him off the streets.
translation.zh: ‎但别再让他去那片街区了

translation.en: Our timeline has moved up. It's almost ready.
translation.zh:
‎-咱们的进度被迫加快了
‎-实验就快成了

translation.en: [man 1] Show me.
translation.zh: ‎演示一下

translation.en: Feeding time.
translation.zh: ‎开饭咯

translation.en: And the side effects?
translation.zh: ‎有什么副作用吗？

translation.en: [man 2] Stabilizing.
translation.zh: ‎不够稳定

translation.en: You have a subject in mind?
translation.zh: ‎你心里有实验对象了吗？

translation.en: [man 1] Someone just volunteered.
translation.zh: ‎刚才有人自告奋勇呢
